transforms.code:
instances = []
	res = system.tag.browse(path="[System]Gateway/Database")
	for result in res.getResults():
		instances.append({"database":result["name"]})
	return instances

instances = []
	res = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(system.device.listDevices())
	for result in res:
		instances.append({"name":result["Name"], "enabled":result["Enabled"], "state":result["State"], "driver":result["Driver"]})
	return instances
